We collect personally identifiable information from you only when you voluntarily provide us with this information, such as when establishing an account, contacting us with a question or comment, utilizing an "Email to a Friend" feature, or signing up to receive emails about our latest products and services.
By providing your personal information to Propio, you signify your acceptance of the Terms of Use and agree that Propio may collect, use and disclose your personal information as described herein.

In general, we use personal information collected on the Site for the specific purpose for which it was volunteered; to market, sell, or provide products and services; and to comply with any legal or regulatory requirements, process or provisions.
